about_the_game:
Step into Ancient Legends
In Aatral Origins, experience the vibrant world of Indian and Tamil folklore brought to life. As Vallaan, a prince turned king, you embark on a quest to uncover the ancient secrets threatening your kingdom. Your journey through history, myth, and battle forges an unforgettable adventure, all crafted by a solo developer’s passion.

Enhanced Combat System
Wield an upgraded combat system with a range of powerful weapons, including an agile new weapon that’s fast, versatile, and capable of adapting to different encounters. Mastering each weapon’s strengths will be crucial as you face increasingly challenging foes, offering a balanced blend of power and finesse that evolves with Vallaan’s journey.

Challenging Enemies and Bosses
Encounter a diverse array of enemies, each demanding unique strategies to conquer. From menacing creatures to towering bosses, every battle requires skill and adaptability. As you progress, gain new abilities that expand your arsenal and allow you to face even tougher challenges.

Expansive World and Exploration
Traverse a stunningly crafted world of diverse landscapes, each more immersive than the last. From lush forests to ancient ruins, explore vast areas filled with hidden secrets and lore. To bring these environments to life, Aatral Origins is powered by Unreal Engine 5’s Nanite and Lumen, delivering an unparalleled level of visual detail and lighting realism.

Your Faithful Companion, Kidori
In your quest, you’ll be joined by Kidori, a loyal horse who serves as both companion and transportation across expansive lands. Together, you’ll cross breathtaking regions, find hidden paths, and form an unbreakable bond that’s as much a part of the journey as the battles you’ll face.

Intricate Puzzles and Mysteries

  • Aatral Origins tests your wits with new puzzles woven into the story. Solve intricate challenges that reveal more about Vallaan’s world and the ancient secrets hidden within it, offering both rewards and deeper connections to the game’s rich lore.

Immersive Sound and Visual Effects
Every moment in Aatral Origins is designed to captivate with high-quality visuals and immersive sound effects. Developed by a dedicated solo developer, the game surpasses expectations with stunning visuals, lifelike animations, and atmospheric soundscapes that elevate each battle and landscape.

content_descriptors.notes: Content Warning: This game contains elements of violence, blood, gore, and nudity. It is intended for mature audiences and may not be suitable for players under 18 years of age. Viewer discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: Resolution: 1080p at Medium settings, ~30-45 FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X or Intel Core i5-11600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 (12 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: Resolution: 1440p at High/Epic settings, ~60 FPS

short_description: In 2nd-century Korkai, prince Vallaan rises as king after his father’s death in battle. As unknown mythical creatures devastate his land, Vallaan embarks on a quest to uncover the dark force behind the chaos, facing monstrous demons to avenge his people and restore peace.
